org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution

Class FGaussianConvolve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.FGaussianConvolve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>, SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>

    public class FGaussianConvolve
extends Object
implements SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    Image processor for FImage capable of performing convolutions with Gaussians.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.openimaj.image.processor.SinglebandImageProcessor

      • FGaussianConvolve

        public FGaussianConvolve(float sigma,
                         float truncate)
        Construct an FGaussianConvolve with a Gaussian of standard deviation sigma. The truncate parameter defines how many sigmas wide the kernel is.
        Parameters:
        sigma -
        truncate -

    • Method Detail

      • makeKernel

        public static float[] makeKernel(float sigma)
        Construct a zero-mean Gaussian with the specified standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        sigma - the standard deviation of the Gaussian
        Returns:
        an array representing a Gaussian function

      • makeKernel

        public static float[] makeKernel(float sigma,
                                 float truncate)
        Construct a zero-mean Gaussian with the specified standard deviation.
        Parameters:
        sigma - the standard deviation of the Gaussian
        truncate - the number of sigmas from the centre at which to truncate the Gaussian
        Returns:
        an array representing a Gaussian function

      • processImage

        public void processImage(FImage image)
        Description copied from interface: ImageProcessor
        Process an image. Implementing classes must alter the image passed in-place or assign the output to the input using Image.internalAssign(Image).
        Specified by:
        processImage in interface ImageProcessor<FImage>
        Parameters:
        image - The image to process in place.
